previewArticle.title: Sporting Kansas City vs. Philadelphia Union | MLS Match Preview

recapArticle.title: Sporting Kansas City 1, Philadelphia Union 1 | MLS Match Recap

timelineItems.desc: Friday night action kicks off at Sporting Park as the visiting Philadelphia Union hope to take points off Eastern Conference leaders Sporting Kansas City.
timelineItems.title: KICKOFF: Sporting Kansas City vs. Philadelphia Union

timelineItems.comment: First Half begins.

timelineItems.name: jesterwords
timelineItems.text: Union looking to find some continuity with this two holding midfielder lineup. Cruz and Seba are not fast enough to counter. #DOOP #SKCvPHI

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Conor Casey (Philadelphia Union) header from a difficult angle on the left is close, but misses to the right. Assisted by Sebastien Le Toux with a cross following a corner.

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: Benny quick feet. #SKCvPHI http://t.co/NzgXby3Vxh

timelineItems.name: OB Asante
timelineItems.text: Nice sequence Phily,#SKCvPHI

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  Sporting Kansas City. Conceded by Maurice Edu.

timelineItems.desc: Shot on goal by Dom Dwyer (Sporting Kansas City).
timelineItems.title: CHANCE: Dom Dwyer has his header cleared off the line

timelineItems.name: Allison Swett
timelineItems.text: Here we go, here we go, here we go!! #SportingKC http://t.co/h7LAANOGFD

timelineItems.comment: Attempt blocked. Dominic Dwyer (Sporting Kansas City) header from the centre of the box is blocked. Assisted by Toni with a cross.

timelineItems.name: Allie Roberts
timelineItems.text: #sportingkc #datenight #earlyanniversary

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  Sporting Kansas City. Conceded by Brian Carroll.
Sheanon Williams (Philadelphia Union) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Dominic Dwyer (Sporting Kansas City).

timelineItems.name: Andrew Dillon
timelineItems.text: M’Bolhi would’ve parried that. #SKCvPHI

timelineItems.name: Phil Giangiulio
timelineItems.text: I think that's why MacMath is being replaced #doop

timelineItems.name: Purfekt Citizcen
timelineItems.text: #skcnation  #SportingKC

timelineItems.comment: Conor Casey (Philadelphia Union) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Kevin Ellis (Sporting Kansas City).

timelineItems.name: ThisIsSporting.com
timelineItems.text: You almost score on a normal corner, then turd away the next chance going short. Hate short corners. #sportingkc

timelineItems.name: Ashleigh Ignelzi
timelineItems.text: Is tonight #SKC's 46 or 47 consecutive sellout? Impressive either way. #SKCvsPHI #MLS

timelineItems.name: SOBWs
timelineItems.text: SOBWs on the road supporting our @PhilaUnion v @SportingKC #DOOP http://t.co/fdVdZqXw73

timelineItems.name: Steve Brisendine
timelineItems.text: At least you get a warning before Casey backs into you in the area: He beeps, and a yellow light flashes over his head.

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Conor Casey (Philadelphia Union).
Andy Gruenebaum (Sporting Kansas City) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

timelineItems.name: Olivier Brett
timelineItems.text: Malgré les erreurs techniques, le rythme donné par les deux équipes rend le début de match très intéressant! #SKC v #Union

timelineItems.name: Dave Zeitlin
timelineItems.text: "It's hard for this young man but it is what it is." MacMath should feel better after that TV analysis.

timelineItems.name: Madison Martin
timelineItems.text: First time at a #sportingkc game! #soccer #ibelievethatwewillwin

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Aurélien Collin (Sporting Kansas City).
Conor Casey (Philadelphia Union) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

timelineItems.name: alyssa martinez 🌻
timelineItems.text: #SportingKC

timelineItems.name: Christopher Weyrauch
timelineItems.text: Connor Casey shouldn't be playing soccer. He should be bouncing at sOme dive bar in the Nevada desert. #SKC

timelineItems.name: Steve Brisendine
timelineItems.text: If he scores at any point this season, I'm calling dibs on "Igor Golião."

timelineItems.comment: Offside, Philadelphia Union. Conor Casey tries a through ball, but Vincent Nogueira is caught offside.
Match ends, Sporting Kansas City 1, Philadelphia Union 1.

timelineItems.name: Tim Coyne
timelineItems.text: Has to be disappointing for #SKC #MLS

timelineItems.name: steph_flick
timelineItems.text: Ok, I admit it, you were right... I'm having fun at a soccer match ⚽️ #kc #sportingkc #eventhoughitendedinatie

timelineItems.name: Daniel Stroud
timelineItems.text: All in all, draw probably fair for the union. Played well, but if you can't capitalize on your chances, you can't win. #doop

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: FT: @PhilaUnion so close to finding a late winner, but #SKCvPHI ends at 1-1. http://t.co/yElCDIWap3 http://t.co/STJDiJOvBa

timelineItems.name: Isaac Knopf
timelineItems.text: A meh-worthy result for #SportingKC, with the final deadlocked at 1s. Dovale, Zusi, Gruenebaum with the best performances IMO. #SKCvPHI

timelineItems.desc: The Philadelphia Union travel to Sporting Park and escape with a point after drawing with Eastern Conference rivals Sporting Kansas City.
timelineItems.title: HIGHLIGHTS: Sporting Kansas City vs. Philadelphia Union | August 1, 2014

timelineItems.text: I really dig the way Igor plays. #SportingKC

timelineItems.text: Claros looks solid so far. Good D-mids are like good waitstaff: They work efficiently and don't make you wear a funny hat on your birthday.

timelineItems.text: Zac MacMath looks like he hasn't slept in a week #SKCvPHI

timelineItems.name: Kevin Kinkead
timelineItems.text: Sporting has played 3-4 balls already that have completely bypassed both Okugo and Carroll.

timelineItems.text: #SKC dominating this match. They've gotta be more clinical though. #SKCvsPHI

timelineItems.text: Can't blame Philly for wanting to get off this GK Rollercoaster. I'm getting nauseous just watching from home. #SKCvPHI

timelineItems.text: Is this going to be one of those games where Sporting have all the percents of the possession but no percent of the goals?

timelineItems.comment: Lineups are announced and players are warming up.
Andrew Wenger (Philadelphia Union) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Igor Julião (Sporting Kansas City).

timelineItems.name: Conner McCarty
timelineItems.text: Last 10 minutes! 1-1! A #USMNT team goal for #SKC and a first ever MLS goal just after entering the game for #PHI! What a game! #MLSonNBC

timelineItems.name: tin man
timelineItems.text: Obligatory #FreeClaudio request. #SKC

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Amobi Okugo (Philadelphia Union).
Benny Feilhaber (Sporting Kansas City) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

timelineItems.name: Steve Brisendine
timelineItems.text: About time for Sporting to get a guy sent off and pick up a late winner.

timelineItems.name: Kyle Helms
timelineItems.text: The refs are fantastic here. Not. #SportingKC

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Sebastien Le Toux (Philadelphia Union).
Benny Feilhaber (Sporting Kansas City) wins a free kick in the attacking half.

timelineItems.name: Tuyen
timelineItems.text: The look on her face when philly got a goal over #sportingkc Let's go team KC! #soccer #futbol #homegame #kansascity #notsohappy

timelineItems.name: Matt C
timelineItems.text: Philadelphia's game plan is: knock down @SportingKC as much as possible. Blah. Cmon #SKC

timelineItems.name: ThisIsSporting.com
timelineItems.text: Looked like Benny was waiting to dive the moment that ball was passed. Boooooo diving. #SportingKC

timelineItems.name: OB Asante
timelineItems.text: Nope,Okugo should be the one coming out not Noguerra..#SKCvPHI

timelineItems.name: Ryan Measel
timelineItems.text: Nog looked pissed getting subbed. Likely the hardest working Union player there is. #DOOP

timelineItems.comment: Aurélien Collin (Sporting Kansas City) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Andrew Wenger (Philadelphia Union).

timelineItems.name: Total MLS
timelineItems.text: MacMath's distribution is awful. #SKCvPHI

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  Philadelphia Union. Conceded by Igor Julião.
Hand ball by Igor Julião (Sporting Kansas City).

timelineItems.name: Jersey Todd
timelineItems.text: With respect to my friends who swear by #epl and #liga, this @mls #SKCvPHI is pretty darn good.

timelineItems.comment: Attempt blocked. Maurice Edu (Philadelphia Union) header from the centre of the box is blocked. Assisted by Sebastien Le Toux with a cross.
Attempt saved. Sheanon Williams (Philadelphia Union) left footed shot from the centre of the box is saved in the bottom left corner.
Corner,  Philadelphia Union. Conceded by Kevin Ellis.

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: How did that not go in?! #SKCvPHI

timelineItems.name: German Castro
timelineItems.text: PHI fans must have been screaming so loud right now. #SKCvPHI

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Jacob Peterson (Sporting Kansas City) left footed shot from long range on the left is high and wide to the right. Assisted by Benny Feilhaber.
Graham Zusi (Sporting Kansas City) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Andrew Wenger (Philadelphia Union).

timelineItems.name: Peter Daye
timelineItems.text: My. sweet. Lawd. #doop #SKCvsPHI

timelineItems.name: ThisIsSporting.com
timelineItems.text: Peterson, wrong club. #SportingKC

timelineItems.comment: Attempt blocked. Amobi Okugo (Philadelphia Union) left footed shot from the centre of the box is blocked. Assisted by Andrew Wenger.
Second Half ends, Sporting Kansas City 1, Philadelphia Union 1.
